drivers.name: md5k
drivers.comments:
This driver is available in the Ghostscript Printer Application

Part of the gdevmd2k-0.2a package by Shinya Umino. The web page and documentation are in Japanese. Here is an English translation of the driver's web page, and here is the driver README.

drivers.name: ppmtomd
drivers.comments:
This driver works on the MicroDry thermal transfer printers: The Alps MD series, the Citizen printiva series, and the Okidata DP series. It is the successor of the "ppmtocpva" driver.

Note that the "-autoshift" feature is broken in the versions 1.0.2 and older. This is fixed in 1.0.3.

From version 1.1 on the Dye Sublimation mode is fully supported. The VPhoto mode and VPhoto primer support are available from version 1.3 on.

notes:
J.C. Bradfield (jcb@dcs.ed.ac.uk) has written a fully functional driver which converts PPM files ("ppmtomd"). He started hacking ghostscript, but abandoned it.

In reality this is the Alps MD-5000. In Europe it is sold by Okidata. I found this information in the README of Julian Bradfield's ppmtocpva driver. Perhaps the printer works also with this driver, but it works with Julian Bradfield's new ppmtomd driver.

Consumables/Refills: several types of ribbon cartridges, black, cyan, magenta, yellow
